title: Cant open client
body:
every time i try to open the client this pops up 
Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check you internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking acess. 
I am connected( hoe imm writing this, and firewall is not blocking are the servers down or are they getting ddosed.

replies.body: It sounds like you're getting a RADS error, which could be due to connection but also security settings that's blocking the game from loading properly.  I suggest going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as your first step towards resolving it.  Hopefully, this will fix things up!
